title: Workshop on Designing Tablet-Based Handwriting and Arithmetic Learning Modules for Early Elementary Grades

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Educational Theory and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: A hands-on workshop for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to enhance their capacity to design elementary education programs.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the module design process utilizing tablet-based handwriting recognition technology
Learners can analyze interface components of arithmetic learning modules according to evaluation criteria
Learners can propose implementation strategies for mobile microlearning in resource-constrained technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
